title: Flipped Learning-Based Elementary English Vocabulary Acquisition and Learning Motivation Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Case study on applying elementary English education methodologies for pre-service teachers and education enthusiasts.

learning_goals: Explain at least three instructional design frameworks for elementary English vocabulary in a flipped learning environment
Achieve over 80% competency in designing vocabulary activities using learner motivation strategies

Learners develop two job-training pre-/post-learning materials (one quiz, one video lecture) using tools like Canva, Google Docs, or LMS, apply them to actual training, and achieve ≥4/5 in learner satisfaction surveys.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
